name: Yaktrax Summit Traction Device - Unisex
description: Like snow tires for your feet, the Summit Traction Device lets you stride confidently through the winter woods. Heavy-duty spikes grab onto hardpacked trails and icy slopes to keep your footing secure. A twist of the dial is all it takes to pop them on or fine-tune the fit, so you can spend less time adjusting and more time admiring the view.Boa® closure system provides a quick and secure fit.Aggressive spike design grips on packed snow and glacial ice.Flexible sole plates move with the foot to prevent snow buildup.
